Talk011:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>It appears you still have enough
materials to continue trading.<sp:5:0:0>

Would you like to trade for another
ancient blade?
Talk012:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>I previously informed you that Mineru
tasked me with excavating materials
in this vicinity.
One such material was <clr:0000>zonaite<clr:ffff>. I would
ask you to offer me all that you can spare.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>Payment would of course be provided
in return.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I can offer you one ancient blade for
every <clr:0000><sp:2:e:3c:36005a006f006e00610075005f00470065006e0069007500730057006500610070006f006e005f0052006500710075006900720065007300ffff00cd> pieces of<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>zonaite<clr:ffff> you supply.
Talk006:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>Bring me more materials if you would like
another ancient blade. I would be pleased
to trade with you again.
Talk013:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>This is one of the fruits of my excavation.
Take it with my gratitude.
Talk007:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>Welcome.<sp:0:4:0>I will give you one ancient blade in
exchange for <clr:0000><sp:2:e:3c:36005a006f006e00610075005f00470065006e0069007500730057006500610070006f006e005f0052006500710075006900720065007300ffff00cd> pieces of zonaite<clr:ffff>.
Talk014:
I offer you this ancient blade with my
gratitude. <sp:5:1:0>Wait.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>You appear heavily encumbered.<sp:5:0:0> Please
accept this instead.
Talk008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Please prepare<clr:0000> <sp:2:e:3c:36005a006f006e00610075005f00470065006e0069007500730057006500610070006f006e005f0052006500710075006900720065007300ffff00cd> pieces of zonaite<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I am ready to offer you an ancient blade
in exchange.
Talk009:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>You do not have sufficient materials
to trade.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>I require <clr:0000><sp:2:e:3c:36005a006f006e00610075005f00470065006e0069007500730057006500610070006f006e005f0052006500710075006900720065007300ffff00cd> pieces of zonaite<clr:ffff>. I would be
pleased to trade whenever you have an
adequate quantity.
Talk000:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>I have been tasked by<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>Mineru<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>with
gathering materials from the Depths.
This was meant to aid in her research.
My progress was interrupted when the
servant of the Demon King occupied the
Spirit Temple.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Your efforts have allowed me to return to
my duty. <sp:5:0:0>I offer you my deepest thanks.
Talk001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy>You already have a sufficient amount
of zonaite.<sp:0:4:0>Will you trade it for an ancient blade?
Talk002:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>Thank you for the materials.<sp:5:0:0> Please take
this in return.
Talk003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Very well. I would be pleased to
trade anytime.
Talk004:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh. <sp:5:0:0>It appears that you are unable to
carry any more ancient blades.

Talk to me again when you are not at full
capacity. I would be pleased to trade at
any time.
Talk010:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_01>I am sorry to report that you do not have
enough materials to trade.

I require <clr:0000><sp:2:e:3c:36005a006f006e00610075005f00470065006e0069007500730057006500610070006f006e005f0052006500710075006900720065007300ffff00cd> pieces of zonaite<clr:ffff>. That is the
nonarbitrary quantity needed to proceed
with the research at hand.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>My apologies for prioritizing my task in an
uncompassionate way.<sp:5:0:0> I look forward to
trading when you have adequate zonaite.
